name: LocalStack
description: Local AWS cloud stack for development

commands.run: docker run -d --name localstack --network {{NETWORK_NAME}} -p 4566:4566 -p 4571:4571 -v ~/wsdata/localstack/data:/var/lib/localstack -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -e SERVICES=s3,dynamodb,sqs,sns,lambda,ec2,ecs,cloudformation -e DEBUG=1 -e DATA_DIR=/var/lib/localstack localstack/localstack:latest
